author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Google Doodle’s COVID-19 message: Stay home, stay safe
description: Friday’s doodle suggests simple, common ways for people to spend their time creatively at home
content: On Friday, Google joined in the effort to help contain the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic world over with a doodle, with the message: Stay Home. Save Lives: Help Stop Coronavirus. The deadly virus, which has dominated headlines since the start of the year, h… [+1025 chars]
